command.name: create

help.short: The name of the Kubernetes cluster agent pool.
The name of the Kubernetes cluster.
The extended location of the cluster associated with the resource.
The resource ID of the extended location on which the resource will be created.
The extended location type, for example, CustomLocation.
The geo-location where the resource lives

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$agentPoolParameters.properties.attachedNetworkConfiguration.l2Networks" options="l2-networks">
<arg type="array" var="$agentPoolParameters.properties.attachedNetworkConfiguration.l3Networks" options="l3-networks">
<arg type="array" var="$agentPoolParameters.properties.attachedNetworkConfiguration.trunkedNetworks" options="trunked-networks">
<arg type="array" var="$agentPoolParameters.properties.availabilityZones" options="availability-zones" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$agentPoolParameters.properties.labels" options="labels" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@KubernetesLabel_create>" var="$agentPoolParameters.properties.taints" options="taints" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys" arg="$agentPoolParameters.properties.administratorConfiguration.sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array" name="l2Networks" arg="$agentPoolParameters.properties.attachedNetworkConfiguration.l2Networks">
<prop type="array" name="l3Networks" arg="$agentPoolParameters.properties.attachedNetworkConfiguration.l3Networks">
<prop type="array" name="trunkedNetworks" arg="$agentPoolParameters.properties.attachedNetworkConfiguration.trunkedNetworks">
<prop type="array" name="availabilityZones" arg="$agentPoolParameters.properties.availabilityZones">
<prop type="array" name="labels" arg="$agentPoolParameters.properties.labels">
<prop type="array<@KubernetesLabel_create>" name="taints" arg="$agentPoolParameters.properties.taints">

<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array" name="l2Networks">
<prop type="array" name="l3Networks">
<prop type="array" name="trunkedNetworks">
<prop type="array" name="availabilityZones">
<prop type="array" name="labels">
<prop type="array<@KubernetesLabel_read>" name="taints">

help.short: The name of the Kubernetes cluster agent pool.
The name of the Kubernetes cluster.
The Azure resource tags that will replace the existing ones.
The number of virtual machines that use this configuration.
The configuration of the agent pool.
The maximum time in seconds that is allowed for a node drain to complete before proceeding with the upgrade of the agent pool. If not specified during creation, a value of 1800 seconds is used.

The maximum number or percentage of nodes that are surged during upgrade. This can either be set to an integer (e.g. '5') or a percentage (e.g. '50%'). If a percentage is specified, it is the percentage of the total agent pool size at the time of the upgrade. For percentages, fractional nodes are rounded up. If not specified, the default is 1.

The maximum number or percentage of nodes that can be unavailable during upgrade. This can either be set to an integer (e.g. '5') or a percentage (e.g. '50%'). If a percentage is specified, it is the percentage of the total agent pool size at the time of the upgrade. For percentages, fractional nodes are rounded up. If not specified during creation, a value of 0 is used. One of MaxSurge and MaxUnavailable must be greater than 0.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array" name="l2Networks">
<prop type="array" name="l3Networks">
<prop type="array" name="trunkedNetworks">
<prop type="array" name="availabilityZones">
<prop type="array" name="labels">
<prop type="array<@KubernetesLabel_read>" name="taints">
